attributes.action: Punish 'The Sun' newspaper over disgusting rape and murder headline.
attributes.background:
Absolutely disgusted by this headline from July 20th 2016.

https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/1475876/doctors-daughter-necked-six-jagerbombs-in-ten-minutes-on-the-night-she-was-raped-and-murdered/?CMP=spklr-_-Editorial-_-TWITTER-_-TheSunNewspaper-_-20160720-_-News-_-521730770

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. The press is operationally and editorially independent of both the UK Government and Parliament.

You may wish to make a complaint to the Independent Press Standards Organisation (IPSO), which regulates the UK newspaper industry. You can find out more here:

https://www.ipso.co.uk/IPSO/makeacomplaint.html
